page.title: 07ST. BRELADE'S BAY
page.content: St. Brelade's Bay is the main beach in our D block. It is one of the favourite beaches with tourists. There are many hotels along the promenade and numerous shops selling souvenirs. There is a pier which children dive off when they are bathing. There are many water facilities which you can hire out, such as paddling boats, rowing boats and wind surfers. There is a lovely long sandy beach where older people can sit on deck chairs and youngsters can bounce on trampolines. At one end of the beach there are rocks to go climbing on. Behind the beach there is the Winston Churchill Memorial Park which is pleasantly set out with waterfalls, fountains, and flower beds. At night the night clubs and discos get into full swing.
